chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: C programs are made by many people but today whatever you see in this video will be able to understand it well and as a result, logic will be able to make it well.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: So guys, till now whatever we have learned about C programming was either history or installation or some other important things but from today we will start with the basic building blocks which are made by C program.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: So guys, first of all I would like to talk about tokens. Now in C program is made by combining individual tokens.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: If I want to break printf hello world into tokens, then my program will look something like you are still seeing on your screen.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: But to make this representation better, we write this program like this. We write it in compact form and skip the new line.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: Every statement is made by a semi colon in termination C programming.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: Guys, you must have heard a lot of jokes that semi colon is forgotten, semi colon is the biggest thief, semi colon is the brain of a programmer.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: So guys, there is nothing called semi colon, it is used to terminate a statement.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: And if you have not put this semi colon, your program will give you an error, your compiler will tell you, I can't do anything, the compiler will stand in his hand and will tell you that I can't do anything.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: Now we will see its building blocks, the parts like int, curly brace, main, I had told you all.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: Guys, a C program is made with the help of tokens.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: When I talk about tokens, it means the parts that make C program are making C program, its basic building blocks.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: Like we wrote this program in our last video in which we print hello word on the screen.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: If I break it on individual tokens, it will look like this.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: I have separated printf, this symbol, I have separated this string literal, then after that I have separated the semicolon and this.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: I could do it like this, then also it will run as expected.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: As you can see, this hello word has been printed.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: So what I did is I broke it in individual tokens.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: So one token will be keyword or identifier, or constant, or string literal, or symbol.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: What is keyword?

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: First of all, I will talk about keywords.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: Keywords are reserved words in C programming language.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: In C programming language, there are 32 general purpose keywords that you are seeing in your screen.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: So these keywords are in C programming language, they are general purpose keywords.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: And these are reserved words.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: You cannot make any identifier of these words, you cannot make any variable.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: These keywords are reserved in C programming language.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: Like you are looking at the return, this is keyword, you are looking at int, this is keyword.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: So these are reserved words that you cannot use in your programming language.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: In any identifier, in any constant or variable name.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: Let's talk about identifiers.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: Look, identifiers can be the name of any variable, any function, so that we can identify it.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: That's it, the theory of identifiers.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: I don't want to make a separate video for this, it's a simple thing.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: Look, any name that you want to give to any variable or function.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: Like your mom, Rohan, Shubham or Vikrant, whatever you call it, we will make our function, variable,

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: and the entities like constants, we call them identifiers.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: Now in identifiers, capital A to capital Z, small a to small z, and with that, we can underscore and letter numbers.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: So what does C allow in the name of variables, we will see in the next video.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: Just keep in mind that C does not allow punctuation characters, either a dollar, percent, or identifiers.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: Along with that, I would like to tell you that C is a case-sensitive programming language.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: That is, if I name any variable, capital H, and then I name another variable, small h, then they will be different.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: After that, in our C programming language, we used a semicolon.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: Like I told you, first, the semicolon statement is used to terminate.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: And we understand it manually in our mind what the token is and we compact it and put one line,

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: that is, the line of the semicolon, in one single line.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: That is, I have removed all the white spaces and new lines that I have extracted.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: I did this so that my program becomes readable.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4
chunks.text: Along with that, there are some constants in our program, like zero is the constant.

chunks.title: Basic Syntax Of A C Program C Tutorial In Hindi #5.mp4

chunks.text: Along with that, the hello word was a string literal, that is, it was a string.
